item.title: 在米莱伊的休克疗法启动之前，阿根廷第四季度经济就已下滑
item.description: 阿根廷经济在第四季度出现萎缩，巩固了全年的负增长，甚至在即将上任的总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）将削减开支作为其休克疗法的一部分之前也是如此。【原文：Argentina’s economy shrank in the fourth quarter, consolidating a full year of negative growth, even before incoming President Javier Milei slashed spending as part of his shock therapy.】

item.title: 阿根廷油田亿万富翁对米莱伊充满 "希望
item.description: 石油管道制造商特纳里斯公司（Tenaris SA）的亿万富豪总裁保罗-罗卡（Paolo Rocca）说，人们对阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）能够加快该国页岩矿藏的开发寄予厚望。【原文：Paolo Rocca, billionaire chief of oil-pipe maker Tenaris SA, said expectations are high that Argentina’s President Javier Milei can turbo-charge development of the country’s shale deposits.】

item.title: 美联储将保持当前缩减资产负债表的节奏
item.description: 即使过剩的流动性继续从金融体系中流失，美联储仍将保持减持债券的步伐。【原文：The Federal Reserve will maintain the pace at which it’s reducing bond holdings, even as excess liquidity continues to drain from the financial system.】

item.title: 美联储将 2024 年利率中值预测维持在 3 次下调后债券反弹
item.description: 美联储政策制定者在修订利率预测后继续预计年底前将降息三个季度，同时预计未来几年的利率将高于 12 月份的水平，国债收益率随之下降。【原文：Treasury yields declined after Federal Reserve policy makers’ revised interest-rate forecasts continued to anticipate three quarter-point cuts by year-end, while projecting higher rates in future years than they saw in December.】

item.title: 纳格尔说他更担心欧洲经济而非德国经济
item.description: 德国联邦银行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）说，他对欧洲经济的担忧超过了对祖国经济的担忧。【原文：Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel said he’s more worried about Europe’s economy than that of his homeland — using a term coined to describe Germany’s post-unification struggles.】

item.title: 米高梅探索出售俄亥俄州和马萨诸塞州的赌场
item.description: 据知情人士透露，米高梅国际酒店集团正在探索出售其在俄亥俄州诺斯菲尔德公园和马萨诸塞州斯普林菲尔德的赌场业务。【原文：MGM Resorts International is exploring the sale of its casino operations at Ohio’s Northfield Park and in Springfield, Massachusetts, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 加拿大央行预计今年将出现降息条件
item.description: 加拿大央行官员表示，如果经济发展符合他们的预测，他们很可能会在今年开始降息，但他们也表示，春季房地产反弹将使通胀形势更加复杂。【原文：Bank of Canada officials said they’ll likely be able to start cutting rates this year if the economy evolves in line with their forecasts, but indicated that a spring housing rebound would complicate the inflation picture.】

item.title: Astera 因人工智能需求被抢购 7.13 亿美元首次公开募股后暴涨 46
item.description: Astera Labs Inc.股价在首个交易日高开 46%，此前这家半导体连接公司及其投资者在一次规模更大的首次公开募股中筹集了 7.13 亿美元，投资者纷纷涌入人工智能相关股票。【原文：Astera Labs Inc. shares opened 46% higher on their first trading day after the semiconductor connectivity company and its investors raised $713 million in an upsized initial public offering, as investors pile into AI-related stocks.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利瞄准 10 亿美元的能源转型赌注
item.description: 据知情人士透露，摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的资产管理部门计划筹集至少 10 亿美元的资金，用于设立一个新基金，专门用于能源转型押注。【原文：Morgan Stanley’s asset-management arm plans to raise at least $1 billion for a new fund dedicated to energy-transition bets, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 巴西第二大银行称卢拉一直在寻求帮助
item.description: 巴西银行（Banco do Brasil SA）首席执行官塔尔希亚娜-梅德罗斯（Tarciana Medeiros）说，巴西总统要求巴西第二大银行加入政府的努力，帮助促进信贷和经济增长。【原文：Brazil’s president asked the country’s second-largest bank to join his government’s efforts to help boost credit and economic growth, Banco do Brasil SA Chief Executive Officer Tarciana Medeiros said.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴通过出售电动汽车制造商新朋股份融资 3.17 亿美元
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士称，阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司出售了约3300万股XPeng Inc.在美国交易的股票，筹集了3.17亿美元。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. raised $317 million from the sale of about 33 million of US-traded shares of XPeng Inc., a person familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 中国铜冶炼企业将讨论收费问题，行业危机正在肆虐
item.description: 中国主要的铜冶炼企业可能会在下周的季度会议上讨论生产计划，因为加工费暴跌有可能使他们的利润化为乌有，这对该行业是一个重大挑战。【原文：Leading Chinese copper smelters may discuss production plans at a quarterly meeting next week after plunging processing fees threatened to wipe out their profits in a major challenge for the industry.】

item.title: UFC 所有者以 3.35 亿美元与拳手达成和解
item.description: 终极格斗冠军赛（Ultimate Fighting Championship）综合格斗联盟的母公司 TKO Group Holdings Inc.【原文：TKO Group Holdings Inc., parent of the Ultimate Fighting Championship mixed-martial arts league, settled two class-action lawsuits involving its fighters for a total of $335 million.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州将公布 50 亿美元电力发展基金的详细情况
item.description: 德克萨斯州监管机构将于周四公布一项 50 亿美元能源基金的详细情况，该基金旨在促进该州新电力项目的发展，而该州多年来饱受电力故障的困扰。【原文：Texas regulators will release details Thursday of a $5 billion energy fund intended to spur development of new power projects in a state plagued by years of electricity glitches.】

item.title: 德拉希的 Altice 称债权人必须削减开支才能实现目标
item.description: 亿万富翁帕特里克-德拉希（Patrick Drahi）的 Altice 公司高管设定了更激进的杠杆率目标，并表示债权人将承担帮助这家陷入困境的法国电信公司实现目标的责任，这引发了该公司债券的暴跌。【原文：Executives at billionaire Patrick Drahi’s Altice set more aggressive leverage targets and said its creditors will be on the hook to help the embattled French telecommunications company meet them, triggering a plunge in its bonds.】

item.title: 新月角石油钻探公司在首席执行官大换血后更名
item.description: 加拿大石油钻探公司新月角能源公司（Crescent Point Energy Corp.【原文：Canadian oil driller Crescent Point Energy Corp. — which has overhauled its operations over the past five years — is changing its name to reflect its new identity.】

item.title: 汉莎航空与罢工有关的成本激增至 2.5 亿欧元
item.description: 自今年年初以来，德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）与罢工相关的成本激增至 2.5 亿欧元（合 2.71 亿美元），因为一系列工人罢工导致潜在乘客流失，飞机无法正常飞行。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG has seen strike-related costs balloon to 250 million euros ($271 million) since the start of the year after a series of walk-offs by workers drove away prospective passengers and put aircraft out of position.】

item.title: 美国经济正在出现裂痕。美联储会怎么做？
item.description: 经济最脆弱国家的金融困境迹象越来越多，足以让人相信美联储已准备好在数据允许的情况下尽快降息。杰罗姆-鲍威尔的评论将有助于提供有关时机的线索。【原文：Signs of financial distress among the most economically vulnerable are mounting enough to believe the Fed is ready to cut rates as soon as the data allow. Jerome Powell’s commentary will help provide clues on the timing.】

item.title: 特朗普起诉 SPAC 迫使董事会成员为媒体交易投票
item.description: 计划将 Trump Media & Technology Group 上市的公司提起诉讼，以迫使其最大的投资者 ARC Global Investments II 在本周的关键截止日期前投票支持该交易。【原文：The company planning to take Trump Media & Technology Group public sued to force its biggest investor, ARC Global Investments II, to vote in favor of the deal before a critical deadline this week.】

item.title: 英国女子比特币洗钱罪名成立，与 60 亿美元中国诈骗案有关
item.description: 一名妇女被伦敦陪审团认定犯有为一名中国逃犯清洗大量比特币的罪行，该逃犯被认为策划了一起近 60 亿美元的投资诈骗案。【原文：A woman was found guilty by a London jury of laundering massive amounts of Bitcoin for a Chinese fugitive who is thought to have orchestrated a near $6 billion investment fraud.】

item.title: 欧元区消费者信心指数升至两年新高
卖空者拉塞尔-克拉克考虑重启对冲基金
item.description: 两年前，做空者罗素-克拉克（Russell Clark）在历史上持续时间最长的牛市中失利后关闭了自己的对冲基金，现在他正准备卷土重来。【原文：Short seller Russell Clark, who shuttered his hedge fund two years ago after losing out to the longest running bull market in history, is preparing a comeback.】

item.title: 审计师德勤辞职，巴克莱家族的 Very 集团遭受重创
item.description: 德勤（Deloitte）辞去了零售企业 Very 集团的审计师职务，在巴克莱家族的商业帝国及其之前对《每日电讯报》的所有权日益受到关注的背景下，Very 集团的债务价值受到冲击。【原文：Deloitte has quit as auditor of retail business the Very Group, hitting the value of its debt amid a growing spotlight on the Barclay family’s business empire and its previous ownership of the Telegraph newspaper.】

item.title: Topgolf Callaway 因报告称正探讨出售或分拆上市而大涨
item.description: Topgolf Callaway Brands Corp. 自 2022 年 5 月以来的最大涨幅，因为有报道称该公司正在探索出售其设备制造部门。【原文：Topgolf Callaway Brands Corp. jumped the most since May 2022 following a report that the company is exploring a sale of its equipment-making arm.】

item.title: 由于市场对俄罗斯交易存有疑虑，德国莱弗森银行推迟出售 AT1 项目
item.description: 德国莱弗森国际银行股份公司（Raiffeisen Bank International AG）推迟了出售混合证券的计划，此前有报道对其从俄罗斯业务部门汇回利润的计划表示怀疑，并导致该银行股价暴跌。【原文：Raiffeisen Bank International AG postponed the planned sale of hybrid securities after a report cast doubt about its plan to repatriate profits from its Russian unit and sent shares of the lender tumbling.】

item.title: 银行老板用浴室取代分行遭议员批评
item.description: 据立法者称，英国客户对位于不寻常地点的替代银行分行感到 "困惑"，这些地点包括花园中心，甚至以前的公共厕所。【原文：British customers are “perplexed” by substitute bank branches in unusual locations including a garden center and even a former public toilet, according to lawmakers.】

item.title: 监视：嘿，美联储，告诉我们你们在监视什么数据吧
item.description:
宏利人寿的唐纳德向鲍威尔发出请求："给我一些启示"

Manulife’s Donald offers a plea aimed at Powell: ‘Give me some insight’

】

item.title: 印度莫迪在和平峰会前与普京和泽连斯基通话
item.description: 据印度总理办公室称，印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪周三与乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基和弗拉基米尔-普京通了电话。【原文：India’s Prime Minister Narendra Modi spoke to Ukraine’s President Volodymyr Zelenskiy and Vladimir Putin over the phone on Wednesday, weeks ahead of a global peace summit in Switzerland to resolve war in Ukraine, according to the Prime Minister’s Office.】

item.title: 肯尼亚贷款机构运营成本激增，KCB 利润下降 8
item.description: 肯尼亚最大的银行肯尼亚商业银行集团（KCB Group Plc）称，由于运营成本激增 61%，全年利润下降 8%。【原文：KCB Group Plc said full-year profit fell 8% as Kenya’s biggest bank saw operating costs surged 61%.】

item.title: 欧洲央行施纳贝尔认为自然利率上升是转折点
item.description: 3 月 20 日，伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔在法兰克福 摄影师：Alex Kraus/Bloomberg【原文：Isabel Schnabel in Frankfurt, on March 20. Photographer: Alex Kraus/Bloomberg】
